elements.label: <Mother Euphresme>
elements.description: <An Orthodox cloistered nun who cannot be considered to be very cloistered or orthodox in her views.>

elements.label: Count Florentin Hunyadi
elements.description: The last scion of an old house, who has left the management of his holdings to others as he spends his middle age in an eternal vacation.

elements.label: Café Nocturne
elements.description: Not many theaters from the time of the Ottoman Empire still remain now that the Republic has founded. But Cafe Nocturne has remained in its nook in Beyoglu. On the right nights, they still dig out the works penned in Armanian, Italian or even more occluded tongues.

slots.label: Song
slots.description: I should begin my performance, by declaring my intentions, my method, my staging.

slots.label: 以轶事交换
slots.description: 只要让他们愿意分享自己的故事，我愿意分享自己的。
